pull.title: windres: use PACKAGE_VERSION rather than building more version numbers
pull.body:
Rather than defining more strings, reuse PACKAGE_VERSION, which is already available.

We also already use PACKAGE_VERSION for `ProductVersion` and `FileVersion` in setup.nsi.

verification.payload:
tree 2550f39dcff43463e48827f5aa80ec41f6cbf636
parent fdd80b0a53b4af0b29cb6e03118e2456d053a757
author fanquake <fanquake@gmail.com> 1629190487 +0800
committer fanquake <fanquake@gmail.com> 1629190487 +0800

windres: use PACKAGE_VERSION rather than building more version numbers

Rather than defining more strings, reuse PACKAGE_VERSION, which is
already available.

We already use PACKAGE_VERSION for `ProductVersion` and `FileVersion` in setup.nsi.

events.message:
windres: use PACKAGE_VERSION rather than building more version numbers

Rather than defining more strings, reuse PACKAGE_VERSION, which is
already available.

We already use PACKAGE_VERSION for `ProductVersion` and `FileVersion` in setup.nsi.

events.body:
Looking at the output in `bitcoin_config.h` PACKAGE_VERSION is defined in the same way so there should be no user-visible change. I cannot find it being defined anywhere (at a higher level) so I suppose it's part of the autoconf system.

Code review ACK f12fbad5a1852706184082c68655fafad4bb9fe1

Contributing GUIX hashes, mine match @fanquake
